tolcapone, isocarboxazid.
Either increases effects of the other by pharmacodynamic synergism. Contraindicated. Both nonselective MAO inhibitors and tolcapone inhibit catecholamine metabolism, leading to increased levels of catecholamines. Potential for dangerously high HR or BP.

tolcapone, metoclopramide intranasal.
Either increases effects of the other by Other (see comment). Avoid or Use Alternate Drug. 
Comment: Avoid use of metoclopramide intranasal or interacting drug, depending on importance of drug to patient.
